Key Match Events: Bumrah notched up 15 dot balls in his four overs, more than half his deliveries, and finishes with figures of 2-13.
Post-Match Reflections: Najmul Hossain Shanto reflects as Bangladesh exit the T20 World Cup
Hardik Pandya is Player of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: India have one foot in the T20 World Cup semifinals
The win moves India to four points in the group. If Australia beat Afghanistan in the next Group 1 match in six hours time then India and the Aussies will both qualify for the semifinals.
